data.question: What is the general formula for the MIL-53(Fe)-Cl solid?

data.answer: The analyses were performed under O2 atmosphere between room temperature and 600°C.

data.answer: No, MIL-53(Fe)-(CO2H)2 remains in its narrow pore form regardless of the liquid used.
